titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1037) to ban the importation of large capacity ammunition feeding devices, and to extend the ban on transferring such devices to those that were manufactured before the ban became law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. DeGette. Petition No: 106-4.

bill.summary: 5/26/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 1037 (firearms control).
